com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.session
Class SPSessionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.session.SPSessionManager

public class SPSessionManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class purpose is to create, handle and manage the SPSession objects.

It provide convenience methods for all the required operations through the use of static methods.

Method Summary

          Returns a set of all valid session token IDs

          Return the current SPSession or throws a RuntimeException if there's none.

getSession

public static SPSession getSession(java.lang.String sessionToken)
Return the SPSession identified by the session token ID or throws a RuntimeException if there's none.

Parameters:
sessionToken - The token id of the session.
Returns:
the SPSession identified by the session token.

getSession

public static java.lang.String getSession(java.lang.String appId,
                                          java.lang.String userId,
                                          java.lang.String securityToken,
                                          android.content.Context context)
Deprecated. This method will be removed from a future release of the SDK.

Gets or creates a session with the provided parameters and sets it as the current session. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if appId is null.

IF a matching session if found for the pair appId-userId, the securityToken is updated with the one provided as parameter (unless null is provided).

Parameters:
appId - Application ID assigned by SponsorPay. Provide null to read the Application ID from the Application Manifest.
userId - The ID of the user for which the delta of coins will be requested.
securityToken - Security Token associated with the provided Application ID. It's used to sign the requests and verify the server responses.
context - Android application context.
Returns:
the session token that identify the session for the provided parameters.

initialize

public static java.lang.String initialize(java.lang.String appId,
                                          java.lang.String userId,
                                          java.lang.String securityToken,
                                          android.content.Context context)

Gets or creates a session with the provided parameters, initializes it with SponsorPay servers and sets it as the current session. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if appId is null.

IF a matching session if found for the pair appId-userId, the securityToken is updated with the one provided as parameter (unless null is provided).

Parameters:
appId - Application ID assigned by SponsorPay. Provide null to read the Application ID from the Application Manifest.
userId - The ID of the user for which the delta of coins will be requested.
securityToken - Security Token associated with the provided Application ID. It's used to sign the requests and verify the server responses.
context - Android application context.
Returns:
the session token that identify the session for the provided parameters.

getAllSessions

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllSessions()
Returns a set of all valid session token IDs

Returns:
